headline: ‘2026 Year Ahead’: Bank of America Picks 2 Stocks to Buy as the Market Moves from Hype to Earnings
summary: The countdown to the new year has begun, and Wall Street is already planning its next chapter. Major institutions and top-tier analysts are sketching out their playbooks for the year ahead – and after a strong run in the markets, these forecasts are shaping how investors prepare their next moves. Enter Savita Subramanian, Bank of America’s equity and quant strategist. Her outlook leans optimistic, yet she keeps both feet on the ground, outlining not just the upside potential but the risks that c
